summary: In 1998, a stunning crime thrust Jasper, Texas into the spotlight. What happened on that summer evening - the death of black hitchhiker James Byrd, Jr. by three white men - became a flash-point for the state of race relations in America.
cast: Roy T. Anderson|Demore Barnes|John Bayliss|James Bearden|Samantha Bee|Conrad Bergschneider|Matt Birman|Kedar Brown|Sandra Caldwell|Marium Carvell|Eugene Clark|Michael Copeman|Neil Crone|Travis Kyle Davis|Aaryn Doyle|Martin Doyle|Cherion Drakes|David Eisner|Craig Eldridge|Michael Ferguson|Jumaane Ford|Louis Gossett Jr.|Charles Woods Gray|Kevin Hanchard|Kate Hennig|J.J. Hewitt|Gary Hudson|Ray Kahnert|Bill Lake|Holly Lewis|Blu Mankuma|Christopher Marren|Andre Mayers|Dean McKenzie|Michael McLachlan|Michael Millar|James Millington|Richard Mills|Michelle Moffat|Joe Morton|Dave Nichols|J.D. Nicholsen|Deborah Odell|Elaine Overholt|Rahnuma Panthaky|Ron Payne|Eric Peterson|Toby Proctor|Leah Renee|Karen Robinson|Philip Shepherd|Victoria Snow|Jeff Topping|Kate Trotter|Jon Voight|Ned Vukovic|Wayne Ward|Ron White|Thick Wilson|Bokeem Woodbine|Emily Yancy|Jesse Jackson|Michael Sercerchi|Maxine Waters
title: Jasper, Texas
